name: Live Art
description:
⚠️Warning: this game is extremely difficult!

HOW IT PLAYS

  • Click and hold to make the pen move through the lines.
  • Avoid the obstacles or the level will fail.
  • After you completed all the lines, the art will be revealed and animated. Looks pretty cool.

FEATURES

  • Very easy to understand
  • Very challenging
  • Animated picture after completing each level
  • Time tracking so you can break your own records!
  • Leaderboard for each level, so you can compete with your Steam friends and the world
  • Killing tons of time easily when playing alone
  • Having great laughs together when playing with friends or family
  • Making great materials for YouTubers and streamers
  • Making you wanna say bad words really badly sometimes. (But don't!).
